scripts.build: ng build --prod --output-path ../../server/public/top && rm -rf ../../server/public/*.ico && rm -rf ../../server/public/assets/ && rm -rf ../../server/public/*.js && rm -rf ../../server/public/*.txt && rm -rf ../../server/public/*.css && rm -rf ../../server/public/*.html && cp -R ../../server/public/top/* ../../server/public && rm -rf ../../server/public/top/
scripts.build-on-window: ng build --prod --base-href / --output-path ../../server/public/top && DEL "..\..\server\public\*.ico" 2>null && RMDIR /s /q ..\..\server\public\assets 2>null && DEL "..\..\server\public\*.js" 2>null && DEL "../../server/public/*.txt" 2>null && DEL "../../server/public/*.css" 2>null && DEL "../../server/public/*.html" 2>null && DEL "../../server/public/*.css" 2>null && XCOPY "..\..\server\public\top\*" "..\..\server\public" /s /i 2>null && RMDIR /s /q ..\..\server\public\top 2>null
